title: Zehirli Sarmaşık
overview: Yakut and Sinem are two close friends. When Yakut's mother falls ill, Sinem and Yahut set out together. But Yahut's mother, Ms. Mesude, has already passed away. While Yakut is struggling with the pain of losing his mother, Sinem finds the letter left for Yakut. When Sinem sees what is written in the letter, she decides to destroy it. In the letter, it is written that Yakut's real mother is Ceyla Benderli, a well-known person in the country and a wealthy woman. Yakut, who is unaware of the existence of her real mother, is the girl that Ceyla's stepson Derin fell in love with at first sight. However, fate has other plans for Yakut. Sinem, who grew up in an orphanage, realizes that all these years she was jealous of Mesude Hanım, whom she thought was Yakut's mother. However, he cannot tell the truth to Yakut. Finally, he decides to get to know Ceyla Benderli and her surroundings better and makes a terrible plan for this. He decided to enter Benderli Farm once.
